ej,folit001,P,johnm901,Charging mound $Tim Foli fouled off the second pitch that was up and in; he charged the mound and traded punches with pitcher Larry Gura; both benches cleared; Foli ejected by HP umpire Mark Johnson; Foli was then charged with the strikeout due to the 0-2 count when he was replaced

ej,mcnaj801,M,garcr901,Arguing batter was out of box Angels manager John McNamara ejected by 1B umpire Richie Garcia arguing that a batter should be called out for being out of the box sometime in game

ej,clarb001,P,kaisk901,Fighting with Rod Carew $Rod Carew and pitcher Bryan Clark exchanged words as Carew ran past the mound going back to the bench; Clark threw his glove down but Carew hesitated; Rick Burleson charged the mound from the on deck circle; Burleson suffered a separated right shoulder when he was tackled by Spike Owen; Al Cowens, on the disabled list at the time, ran out of the clubhouse in his underwear and shower shoes to get into the bench-clearing brawl; Clark ejected by HP umpire Ken Kaiser
